Residents

Moving to a new unit or simply trying to get connected in your new retail space shouldn’t be hard. Our team can get your internet, free-to-air TV, Foxtel, 5G services, your security system and other services up and running quickly and easily. We promise excellent customer care, efficient service and super-fast connection. Our job is to make your life easier.

More Info

Developers

Your projects are your lifeblood. And that means you need every element to work well, run smoothly and do what it’s supposed to do. BFN offers innovative, flexible fibre network solutions that are designed to suit your needs. And because we’re an open access fibre carrier, we ensure you have the freedom of choice to continue to work with the providers that you choose.

More Info

Retailers

Infrastructure is central to your ongoing business. Faults, failures and speed issues reflect badly on everyone involved. At BFN, we ensure that our high-speed, innovative infrastructure is built, serviced and maintained to the highest professional standards at all times. Our team works with you to ensure that your services are delivered to your customers with excellence and ease.

More Info

Why choose BFN?

Reliable, Efficient, Professional.

Reliable, efficient, professional and backed by years of fibre network experience, we guarantee fully integrated, cleverly designed, super-fast FTTP networks that solve your networking problems. Whether it’s for a multiple dwelling residential property or a mixed use development…

We work for you.
